Task<bool>

InitializeAsync()

Performs initialization tasks for the settings page. Includes retrieving the auto control setting from local settings and whether the current app is enabled/disabled for launching on startup.

public Task InitializeAsync()

Returns

Task

LaunchOnStartupActions(bool)

Retrieves the current state of the startup task for the appication and enables/disables it accordingly based on the argument.

public Task LaunchOnStartupActions(bool enable)

Parameters

enable bool

Bool representing whether to enable (true) or disable (false) launching on startup for the app.
